named-query.name: Users.getUserDetails
named-query.query: SELECT u FROM Users u WHERE u.username = :username and u.password = :password

named-query.name: Crop.listAllCropCat
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT c.cropPK.cropcategory FROM Crop c

named-query.name: Crop.listNameByCat
named-query.query: SELECT c.cropPK.crop FROM Crop c WHERE c.cropPK.cropcategory = :cropcategory

named-query.name: Resource.listResCatPerCrop
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT r.resourcePK.resourcecategory FROM Resource r WHERE r.resourcePK.cropcategory =:cropcategory AND r.resourcePK.crop =:crop

named-query.name: Resource.listResDetPerCrop
named-query.query: SELECT r.resourcePK.resourcename FROM Resource r WHERE r.resourcePK.cropcategory =:cropcategory AND r.resourcePK.crop =:crop AND r.resourcePK.resourcecategory =:resourcecategory
